id: [Resources for Artists] Folder Icon Set for Windows/Notion - Soft Cottagecore
name: [Resources for Artists] Folder Icon Set for Windows/Notion - Soft Cottagecore
description: Hello!If you want to have your Notion dashboard or Windows folders organized in a cute aesthetic way with beautiful cottagecore shades and soft palettes, well, you're in luck!These folders are meant to be used on Windows or anything you like, really. It's a great way to organize your folders with some color and keep everything very tidy. There is a small comparison from before and after the customization in both light and dark mode on the banner, so you can see how it looks like on Windows!This
features: (30) Icons in both .ICO and .PNG formats, 448x320px; A ReadMe file containing instructions and important information (Please read!)
